author: elfontan
body:
#### PR description:
Update of the scouting event content for the last menu of 2025 pp data-taking (V1.3) to save some lower level calo information, namely the RecHits from HBHE and ECAL. For ECAL, recHits are saved before and after cleaning.

New Scouting data formats are introduced along with a single producer to define all collections.  Different information is saved according to the hit type:
* ECAL Barrel (EB): energy, detId, time, flags
* ECAL Endcap (EE): energy, detId, time
* HBHE: energy, detId

_NOTES:_
* A backport of this PR to production release CMSSW_150X will be needed.
* Proposal was originally discussed at the [TSG meeting on July 2nd](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1559372/#34-scouting-calotowers-physics)).

[cc: @missirol @Sam-Harper: thanks for the contributions! @silviodonato @patinkaew for scouting; @mtosi @bainbrid as TSG coordinators] 


#### PR validation:
The PR has been prepared starting from CMSSW_15_1_X_2025-07-20-0000:
```
cmsrel CMSSW_15_1_X_2025-07-20-0000
cd CMSSW_15_1_X_2025-07-20-0000/src
cmsenv
git cms-init
git cms-addpkg HLTrigger/special
git cms-addpkg DataFormats/Scouting
scram b && scram b code-checks && scram b code-format && scram b
```
New unit tests are introduced to test the validity of the new data formats and are used as part of the validation process:
```
scram b runtests_TestRun3ScoutingDataFormats
scram b runtests
```
title: Adding Calo RecHits to the Scouting Event Content (end of 2025 data-taking)
